about_the_game:
Whacking Hell! is an upcoming frantic 2D top-down shooter with roguelite elements.

The gates of hell have opened: whack all the monsters before they whack you! Collect their souls, ramp up your weapons and your spells, and become a slaughtering machine! Defeat waves of enemy attacks and nasty bosses by choosing the rigth path of upgrades.

This demo gives you a glimpse of what the full game will be, by offering one stage, one character and one weapon, with no permanent upgrades yet. You are welcome to try it and give us ytour feedback, so we know what we should focus on in priority while developing the full game. Thanks!
